questions.question: What is the coordination number of SCP?

explanations.d: There are 6 neighbouring atoms for each atom in SCP lattice

questions.question: What is the coordination number of BCC?

explanations.d: There are 8 neighbouring atoms for each atom in BCC lattice

questions.question: What is the meaning of packing fraction?

answers.a: The ratio of volume occupied by atoms to the total volume of an unit cell
answers.b: The ratio of number of atoms in unit cell to the total number of atoms in the crystal
answers.c: The ratio of the coordination number of the lattice to the maximum possible coordination number
